name: Stockline
long_description:
Stockline is an AI-native ERP for food wholesalers. 
We're starting by automating order entry with AI and in the process replacing clunky ERPs from the 90s. 

During the S25 batch, we went zero to $234k ARR. The market is a $25b opportunity. 

Before food reaches your plate, thereâ€™s a $990b+ industry still relying on humans doing manual retyping and copy paste into outdated ERPs. 
You can think of us AI teammates that replaces both people doing the manual work and the software itself. 

Team is 2 Polytechnique alums who dropped out of Stanford and MIT. Mariem is daughter of the fish industry and Moncef started coding and building softwares at 13.
